name: Audio-Technica AT2020USB-X
description: Legendary AT2020 sound in USB form. Features 24-bit/96kHz recording, built-in headphone jack with mix control, and the warm AT sound loved by creators.

reviews.review_text: AT2020 sound without an interface. Perfect entry point.
Warm Audio-Technica sound. Flattering for voice.
Picks up room noise. Needs treatment.
